channel.title: Report from Russia
channel.description:
E.W. Ziebarth, Dean of the summer session at University of Minnesota, and ten other faculty members embarked upon a month-long trip through the Soviet Union. Ziebarth interviewed his peers about their thoughts on the trip.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Dr. J.W. Buchta and Dr. William Howell
item.description: The series concludes with E.W. Ziebarth interviewing Dr. J.W. Buchta and Dr. William Howell about the trip to the Soviet Union that they embarked upon.
item.dc:creator: Ziebarth, E. W. (Elmer William), 1910-
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Dr. Francis Boddy
item.description: E.W. Ziebarth speaks to Dr. Francis Boddy about the time he has spent in the Soviet Union.
item.dc:creator: Ziebarth, E. W. (Elmer William), 1910-
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Thomas Magner
item.description: E.W. Ziebarth speaks to Thomas Magner, chairman of the Department of Slavic and Oriental Languages at the University of Minnesota, about the time he has spent in the Soviet Union.

item.dc:subject: World Politics
